actionConfiguration.body: bucket = "LibreInventoryTransactions" start = 2000-01-01T00:00:00Z stop = 2022-02-24T12:15:11+11:00 bins = ["MEL/ADYLIVE/A010","MEL/ADYLIVE/A011"] from(bucket: bucket) |> range(start: start, stop: stop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inventoryTransaction") |> filter( fn: (r) => exists r["storageLocation.name"]) |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["storageLocation.name"] ,set: bins)) |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value") |> keep(columns: ["material.code", "status.code", "carrier.id", "storageLocation.name", "quantity"]) |> group(columns: ["material.code", "status.code", "carrier.id", "storageLocation.name"], mode:"by") |> sum(column: "quantity")
